items.title: Intuit: Mailchimp And TurboTax Live Platforms Can Turbocharge Growth
items.description: Intuit's profitability and efficiency metrics in the last 5 years declined and then showed signs of recovery. Read why I rate INTU stock a Buy now.

items.title: $5.26 Tn Artificial Intelligence (AI) Market Trends and Global Forecasts to 2035: BFSI Sector Leads as AI Revolutionizes Financial Services, Healthcare on the Rise
items.author: Na
items.description: The global artificial intelligence market is projected to surge from USD 273.6 billion in 2023 to USD 5.26 trillion by 2035, driven by advances in cloud and AI technologies. Key segments like machine learning and cloud-based deployments are leading the current growth trends, with the BFSI sector and healthcare industry being the major beneficiaries.
